channel.title: Matrix 718 Some commands
channel.description:
Hello Everybody, can some one help me add some commands? like ::home ::pvp ::clanwars ... etc i need 1. The file that i must use 2. the commands and where i have to put them. and if i can add command for warrior clothes, Food like ::food or ::warrior __________________________________________________________________________________________
i want to edit some spawn items like dragon claws because it is free on spawn.. i mean ::item 14484 its already on! (I USE Matrix-718) ;)
Thank's
